name: Neblob Jumper
description:
Neblob Jumper is simple verical platform jump game. Avoid obstacles and move further in the level.

Some features:

  • Eight never-ending levels
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • High score

There are three types of levels:

  • Only way up
  • Only way down
  • And just a small room where you have to survive as long as you can.

Game has three difficulty levels:

  • In normal mode, you have lifes that you can pick up during level (orange balls). In addition, you have opportunity to jump in the air.
  • In normal mode, you have not opportunity to jump in the air.
  • In hard mode, you have only one life.
